title: Dr Goswami Shivdani Giri
content:
The processor is fast as if having 8 gb ram. No issues related to personal use. It has pre-installed Win 11, MS Office 2021 and Mc Afee, and this becomes the main attraction. The battery backup is at least 4 hours. In total the laptop is worth considering.
Those who want to purchase a good laptop under budget should certainly go for it. Brand matters a lot too.

title: Ramnath H
content: This is a pretty gud budget laptop, for whats inside it , this one is really worth the money, but when it comes to the body, its really plasticky, the quality is is just above that of chromebooks body , the screen is pretty good, battery life is pretty average only 4 to 5 hrs mostly. Keyboard is standard.The trackpad quality is pretty bad actually, it feels pretty local to be honest(I use a seperate mouse ) so i barely use the trackpad because of it too.

title: Veteran User
content: Very light weight. Easy to operate
